column2: but if youve been to au cheval and gilt bar
column3: you kind of know what to expect.  Yes
column4: the meat was good here (ordered the rib eye since we were told that would be easiest for sharing).  Tried the burger too.  Again
column7: but also pretty hearty and heavy.  They season well and use butter
column8: hence why things taste good.  I think I prefer going to gilt bar for the other pasta
column11: and they still have a good rib eye as well.  But yes
column12: bavettes is still very very good.
